item.dc:creator: @X_Zion_X X Zion X
item.description:
@X_Zion_X wrote:

client.java:17565: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PutNPCCords location: class client PutNPCCords = true; ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error The Files Have Compiled Successfully. Press any key to continue . . .

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop ---------- } else if (NPCID == 1552) { ----------- PutNPCCords = true; ---------- WanneShop = 45; --------------- } else if (NPCID == 209) { // Nulodian PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 40; // Black Armour Shop } else if (NPCID == 551) { //Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 1; //General Pk Store } else if (NPCID == 555) { //Shop Keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 10; //Varrock Armor shop } else if (NPCID == 550) { //Lowe PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 11; //Varrock Armor shop } else if (NPCID == 584) { //Heruin PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 12; item.title: Shops
item.dc:creator: @X_Zion_X X Zion X
item.description:
@X_Zion_X wrote:

I use a shopmaker to try to make a shop and then i do what it says and this is what it says to do.

[Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 1552) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 45;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
45 Holiday_Shop 1 1 1053 200000000 1055 225000000 1057 250000000 1050 150000000 1040 325000000 1046 350000000 1044 375000000 1048 400000000 1038 425000000 1042 450000000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
1552 2804 3117 0 0 0 0 0 1 Holiday_Shop

Is that right i tryed doing it and get errors.

Read full topic
